Title: Substring Order II
Description: You are given a string of length n. If all of its substrings (not necessarily distinct) are ordered lexicographically, what is the kth smallest of them?
Input Specification:
The first input line has a string of length n that consists of characters a–z. 
 The second input line has an integer k.
Output Specification: Print the kth smallest substring in lexicographical order.
